alert.note: Alert for Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:01PM EDT until August 15 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR DOUGHERTY...SOUTH CENTRAL LEE...NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN AND SOUTH CENTRAL TERRELL COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA... At 601 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Turner City, or over Albany, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Albany, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Stocks, Radium Springs, Forrester, Lockett Crossing, South Albany, Southwest Ga Regional A/P, Palmyra, Pecan City and Ducker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
